description: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans and Canadian Coast Guard has a requirement for the provision of relocation services of office equipment and furniture, and  Accommodation support services. The services includes installation, reconfiguration of panel systems, On premise storage, and transportation of materials, Accommodation support services, Goods handling and on premise services. According to the Governing contract sources Page June 16 2023, the notice sits at 3000-4388 however this was noted to be succesfully amended with minor change prior to publication.
duration_in_months: They  want this contract to start on 2023-11-01 and estimated to last for 14 months.
tags: News related preventative measures preempted costly upgrade provisions with Bocket types confirmation
full_summary:
# Office Relocation and Furniture Services Tender Announcement

## Notice Title

*   English Title: Office relocation, furniture installation, tenant accommodation support and warehouse storage services
    *   French Title: Déménagement de bureaux, installation du mobilier et soutien à l’aménagement des locaux

## Solicitation Details

*   **Reference Number**: cb-6485-59553444
*   **Amendment Number**: 4
*   **Solicitation Number**: 30004388
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-06-16
*   **Tender Closing Date and Time**: 2023-07-11T13:00:00
*   **Amendment Date**: 2023-07-05
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-11-01
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-10-31
*   **Contracting Entity**: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
*   **Solicitation Status**: Cancelled
*   **Commodity Classification**: 72101507 - Building maintenance service
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Solicitation Description

This tender announcement invites commercial vendors to submit proposals to provide relocation and furniture installation services for Fisheries and Oceans Canada’s National Capital Region (NCR) office. Services will include installation and reconfiguration of panel systems and various other commercial furniture, office storage solutions, and accessory services as needed, to support office relocations, moves and conversions as a result of Federal Government’s Workplace transformation leading towards efficiencies around vacant space.

Service details and considerations and provision of relocation services of office equipment and furniture to ensure safe, accessible work environment is key objective.

Moreover, this provision will include all necessary material and labor to ensure workplace reconfiguration suitable to operational needs of Fisheries and Oceans Canada NCR regional directorates.

## Contact Information

The contracting entity is inviting interested vendors submit their proposals electronically to:

                  DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca

                  Prototype Consulting Ltd.
                  430 Albert Street
                  Ottawa ON
                  K1S 5J3 

 Phone:  (800) 561-1558
 Fax:    (800) 630 – 9869
 Email:   mail@prototypeconsulting.ca

Important: this is a cancelled soluiction.
